conlog
======

-----

.. contents:: **Table of Contents**
    :backlinks: none

Installation
------------

conlog is distributed on `PyPI <https://pypi.org>`_ as a universal
wheel and is available on Linux/macOS and Windows and supports
Python 2.7/3.5+ and PyPy.

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install conlog
